replies.bodyText: I realized as I was releasing 3.11.3.Final that I had changed the test to include 3xx statuses, which makes sense, I think, since the same leakage problem applies. There was a deadline for 3.11.3.Final and I didn't have time to change that, but I did it for 3.14.0.Final. So asking for the original behavior affects this class too.
